definition: to kill/to murder/to attack/to weaken or reduce/to smart (dialect)/(used after a verb) extremely

sentences.english: They're also used to kill bacteria and prevent botulism.
sentences.chinese: 它們亦用於殺菌以及防止肉毒中毒。

sentences.english: In this study microwave was used to sterilize and preserve laver.
sentences.chinese: 利用微波能對小包裝紫菜進行殺菌保鮮研究。

sentences.english: The results showed that the insecticides were more compatible with B. bassiana than the fungicides.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，殺蟲劑與球孢白僵菌的相容性好於殺菌劑。

sentences.english: This paper studied the antiseptic and fresh- keeping technology of pasteurized neutral milk beverage.
sentences.chinese: 研究了巴氏殺菌中性乳飲料的防腐保鮮技術。

sentences.english: He swilled his mouth out with antiseptic.
The high temperatures inherent in steam humidification make it virtually a sterile medium.
sentences.chinese: 蒸汽加溼所固有的高溫，使蒸汽實際上成了殺菌介質。

sentences.english: Buy only pasteurized egg products that bear the USDA inspection mark.
sentences.chinese: 只買農業部檢查標記過的巴氏殺菌蛋。

sentences.english: Deep frying at high temperatures both wipes out the bacteria and turns the stinky tofu sweetly fragrant.
sentences.chinese: 高溫油炸既有殺菌效果，同時也能讓臭豆腐轉臭爲香。

sentences.english: The killing rate is usually affected by the quality of the material.
sentences.chinese: 不同質地的原料對殺菌率有不同影響。

sentences.english: HMF was produced after heating, especially in pasteurizing after filling.
sentences.chinese: HMF是在熱處理後產生，特別是灌裝後巴氏殺菌。

sentences.english: Several fungicides have been found to be absorbed from soil and translocated by plants.
sentences.chinese: 一些殺菌劑在土壤中被吸收，再轉移到植物上。

sentences.english: The properties and wide applications of fungicide tebuconazole in agricultural fields were introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了新型殺菌劑戊唑醇在農業生產中的廣泛應用。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the germicidal efficacy of compound potassium bichromate acid solution and its influencing factors.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察重鉻酸鉀複合酸液殺菌作用及其影響因素。

sentences.english: The final key component of the pasteurization system is the holding tube.
sentences.chinese: 巴氏殺菌設備的最後一個關鍵組成部分是保溫管。

sentences.english: Observations on bactericidal action of antibacterial peptide from Periplaneta americana L.
sentences.chinese: 抗菌肽殺菌作用初步觀察。

sentences.english: Polyiodides have important applications in the bactericidal and electric fields.
sentences.chinese: 它在殺菌和導電方面都有着重要應用。

definition: to become cancerous/transformation to malignancy (of body cells)
